content: वैवस्वतः [विवस्वतोऽपत्यं अण्] {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the seventh Manu who is supposed to preside over the present age; see under Manu; वैवस्वतो मनुर्नाम माननीयो मनीषिणां <ls>R. 1. 11</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 18.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Yama; <ls>R. 15. 45.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Agni. {@--4@} One of the eleven Rudras. {@--5@} The planet Saturn. --तं The present age or Manvantara, as presided over by Manu Vaivasvata or the seventh Manu.
